showScoreExcerpt:
“Unfortunately, you leave “Jaja’s African Hair Braiding a bit unsatisfied, wanting a little more to make the meal complete, and some dessert would also be nice. “Jaja’s African Hair Braiding” is enjoyable enough, and has enough color, but needs a bit more depth, substance, and style to become a knockout.”
